fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
The yEarn Improvement Proposals (YIPs) describe standards for the yEarn platform, including core protocol specifications, client APIs, and contract standards. 

This is the definitive, cannonical reference specification for the core logic.

YIPs are proposed and voted by the YFI community.

[Here](https://yips.yearn.finance/all-yip)you can find a list of YIPs
